lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Friday about the Angels’ 7-6 victory over the Yankees in Game 5 of the American League Championship Series misstated, in some copies, the number of outs in the ninth inning when Angels closer Brian Fuentes intentionally walked Alex Rodriguez. Fuentes had already gotten two outs; he did not walk Rodriguez with no outs.
